text: Which NLP tools do we have in Julia as it is?

elements.text: Which NLP tools do we have in Julia as it is?

text: Look in JuliaText GitHub org for much of it.

elements.text: Look in JuliaText GitHub org for much of it.

text: Outside that org is Transformers.jl, and prob a bunch of other packages I don't know about

elements.text: Outside that org is Transformers.jl, and prob a bunch of other packages I don't know about

text: Thank you, <@U6A936746> and <@U013KHU2XC1>. I'll have a look at those.

elements.text: . I'll have a look at those.

text:
Depending how low level you want to work:
TextAnalysis is probably the go to for “I just want to do a thing”.
(like i used it for topic mapping out internal wiki)

Where as if you want to build a thing yourself:

WordTokenziers is kind of the first step in a wordlevel - ML  process.
(Embeddings,jl goes well here for initializing that bottom layer)

CorpusLoaders.jl gives you training/evaluation data.
